subject: Webinar today! Beyond 3%: Kick Game + experts on modern retail growth

Hello Atto,

Kick Game has built one of the UK’s fastest-growing retail brands — and their Head of Digital is joining us live to share what’s driving results this quarter.

At 3pm (GMT) today, we're bringing together Kick Game, Octane AI, and Blend Commerce for a practical discussion on how to move beyond the industry’s flat 3% conversion rates and deliver journeys that actually convert.

You’ll learn:

- How Kick Game is adapting to new shopper expectations
- How data and personalisation fuel connected journeys
- Why checkout and post-purchase are key growth levers
- Practical strategies from retail leaders shaping the future of ecommerce

? November 12 | 3 pm GMT



Save Your Spot
(https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVYGn465_sckW8RxZRq6hdNtdW4nNzqf5FNY08N3pwdDW5n4LbW7lCGcx6lZ3nlMY_9yKns2-yMKrf5mGxJMyW8cDr1z1Bf8VJVLqwRY5WWdH9N41-RVpcPpmTW8gHHn88CdbkxW8p1lNJ6hLggcW3_dyCP3TMmqRW4Nt-9Q5n_9pDN7H-4_KqJV7sV-jGBl3lqH_DW5r-Hy61gB1f3W2msSDz9kkYJDW5WBQV98h0DWrW5hGM0H11sL6jW6XKYxk8qt_8yW3YCq_p2SFXs0N4PGX9_hkWgmW6kxKzF8sV0N_W4Hkdxc2D3lqtW2NZ8BY1LrCT9VS5qd21PQfswMhSZGGkyGL3W7S6sTg3qK5BjVBxx-w7dFjgGW34BG5b4plgGgW8-GWn78k-ljlW73lf3h8XrMgZN29ZqfKmnW9wW4C0wT953F75WV2VvrH4QNRhdW10xtt61v60bhW1KhY1L7jdKVmW4Z9NX22ZgMwTW24mFMV5gSMWVW5MjxhN2Y-52jW93HKf63MF563W8r_PGD2f4kcLW5HdrKL7LDLm5W4bQBRb7MbzlKf2-lqYR04 )
